QuestData.Title: The General is Dead
QuestData.Description: Perhaps if you spoke to Overlord Krom'gar, $n. Maybe he would listen to what you had to say? You are a Champion in his army, after all. You saw everything. Please help us, $n. We simply wish to be left alone - in peace.$B$BTalk to Overlord Krom'gar and try to help him see that we did not mean for any of this to happen.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Overlord Krom'gar at Krom'gar Fortress in Stonetalon Mountains.
QuestData.RewardText: WHAT? My General has been killed by the tauren? This is treason! HIGH TREASON! They will pay for this grievous error.
